attributes.action: Uphold the motion of the majority of the country and invoke article 50 asap
attributes.additional_details: The country voted in a referendum where 52% voted to exit the EU.
attributes.background: On June 23rd the UK voted and decided to leave the EU. No requirement for another referendum. Vote Leave was successful and the polls proved this. David Cameron has resigned. Brexit must go forward as voters chose and action Article 50 asap.
